name: Idnc.GitHub.io
body:
# Welcome to iDnC Source Code Hub

## The Details
iDnC is a bespoke Developer and Integrator of Business Informatics 

### Even Deeper
iDnC brings the Technology together with the People and Processes to deliver a seemless business experience.

#### Source? Why it matters
As one of the youngest industries software and system integration we bring the pixels to the screen, making it elegant often requires years of experience and days weeks and months of basic hard work. The source code is where that investment is coalesced into reusable assets and deploy-able pieces. This is where they live. Safe from local and most remote threats. 
####Here's what we're working on 
|-|
|Project|Short Description|Link| 
|-|
|Pages| Internal Project Pages with Combinations of DevOps Sandboxes|[here](http://idnc.github.io/Pages)| 
|Telemetery| DataVisualsation of Live Data|[Github PRoject Page](http://telemetry.source.idnc.biz)| 
|SingleNamesSpace| Gluster SWIFT Integrations|[Gluster|[Gluster by Nasa](http://www.gluster.org/)| 
|Data Visulisation| Data Visulisation in 3D||
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
